title: Design Methods
description: This course introduces students to current user-centric design methods used to identify, understand, assess and prioritize the factors and perceptions that contribute to more effective product design and human-centered design solutions.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ID 2012 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ID 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ID 2320 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
